message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Your initial offer was a good starting point, Alice. How about we meet a bit closer to the middle? This offer still gives you a slight advantage.
Bob, I appreciate you trying to meet in the middle.  This is a slight adjustment to your offer that considers the inflation we both face.
Time is running out, Alice, and the value is diminishing quickly. This is a serious offer reflecting the urgency of the situation.
Bob, we're getting close, but this needs to be mutually beneficial.  This offer considers the time pressure and the decreasing value.
